= Description =
Embox can be run on the QEMU. 

= Starting =
== Graphical mode ==
{{{
qemu -kernel <path>/embox
}}}

== Console mode ==
{{{
qemu -nographic -vga none -kernel <path>/embox
}}}

== Start with debugging ==
{{{
qemu -s -S -kernel <path>/embox
}}}
{{{
qemu -nographic -vga none -s -S -kernel <path>/embox
}}}
=== Starting GDB ===

== Network support ==
*-net nic,model=ne2k_pci,macaddr=AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:02 -net socket,connect=127.0.0.1:1234*
